name: Potsdam
fun_fact: Fun fact: Frederick the Great was so obsessed with potatoes that he's called the 'Potato King' - he mandated Germans grow them and is buried at Sanssouci Palace where visitors still leave potatoes on his grave in gratitude!

hero_dishes.origin_story: Frederick the Great promoted potatoes so successfully that they became the German staple
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Traditional restaurants near Sanssouci, Krongut Bornstedt
